SPP2137 Skyrmionics

Topological Spin Phenomena in Real-Space for Applications

Home Projects Members Upcoming events Recent events 2nd Funding period About

2nd Funding period Proposals for the second funding period of SPP 2137 (2021 - 2024) may be submitted by 16 November 2020.

The review of the proposals is planned for 4 & 5 March 2021 in Bad Honnef.

The official call for proposals will be published by the end of August 2020. A draft version may be requested from Christian Pfleiderer.
